summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SunoLegal website updates. All 17 requested features tested and working perfectly including hero section updates, 5-step How It Works flow, feature card clickability, footer styling, Contact page functionality, and scroll animations.
passed_tests: Hero image loads correctly with new source
Verified Lawyers badge positioned at bottom-right without clashing
NyayAI hero badge clickable and routes to /nyayai
How It Works section has 5 steps (01-05) with dark green numbers
Section title 'How It Works — All in One Place' correct
Feature cards fully clickable (entire card navigation)
Feature cards navigate to correct pages (Ask NyayAI → /nyayai, Generate Documents → /documents)
Footer 'Lawyers – Join Early' button has visible green styling
Footer Contact Us link routes to /contact
Contact page loads with correct title and subtitle
Contact form has all required fields (Full Name, Email, Message)
Contact form submission works with success message
Light animations on scroll working (34 animated elements detected)
